name: Bruschetta
description: Our classic Bruschetta features toasted artisanal bread topped with a vibrant mix of diced tomatoes, garlic, and fresh basil. It's finished with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil for a rich, savory flavor. Perfect as a light appetizer or to share with friends.

name: Greek Salad
description: This refreshing salad brings together crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, Kalamata olives, and creamy feta cheese. It's tossed in a homemade lemon-oregano vinaigrette that adds a bright, zesty touch. A perfect balance of flavors and textures in every bite.

name: Grilled Fish
description: Our Grilled Fish is seasoned with herbs and char-grilled to perfection, capturing a smoky, savory flavor. Served with a side of seasonal vegetables and a lemon wedge to brighten the palate. It's a healthy and satisfying choice for seafood lovers.

name: Lemon Dessert
description: A customer favorite, this dessert features a silky lemon custard nestled in a flaky, buttery crust. It's topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a twist of candied lemon peel. Sweet, tangy, and perfectly refreshing to end your meal.

name: Pasta
description: Our house pasta is made with a rich tomato and basil sauce simmered to perfection. Each bite delivers comforting warmth and bold Italian flavor. Served with freshly grated Parmesan and a touch of crushed red pepper if you like a little heat.
